attributes.action: ...endorse a knighthood for Britain's only world champion on two wheels & four - John Surtees.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 1964 John Surtees became world F1 champion driving a Ferrari grand prix car.  Before that, in the 50's and early 60's, he had been two-wheeled world champion on a variety of motorcycles.  He is immensely proud of being British and it's a travesty that he hasn't received the accolade of a knighthood. This MUST be put right as JS isn't getting any younger and he deserves plenty of time to enjoy his new-found status as Sir John Surtees.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
